body.p: FBReader is an e-book reader. FBReader supports ePub and fb2 file formats. FBReader cannot read DRM-protected files, sorry. If you have any books in supported formats, just put your files into Books catalog on the memory card. The books will be available in the library. Network library contains a large set of e-books you can download or buy.
To turn pages swipe screen horizontally or use hardware volume keys.
FBReader is highly customizable. You can configure colors, fonts, directories, page turning options, etc. in the preferences dialog.
If your device has no hardware Menu button, touch bottom-center part of the screen to run menu.
More information about FBReader can be found at our site.
Releases announcements and other news are available on twitter.
If you have any questions or suggestions, please use FBReader group at googlegroups.
If you like the program and would like to support its development, please visit make donation page.
To contact authors, use an e-mail.
